# Agent Instructions

For complete agent instructions, coding guidelines, and project context, please refer to:

ðŸ‘‰ **[AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md)** (at the repository root)

The `AGENTS.md` file contains:

All agent-facing documentation is maintained in `AGENTS.md` to ensure a single source of truth.
